cause.description:
A Secular Humanist embraces critical thinking and a naturalistic world view free of supernaturalism. This stance promotes a society free of racial, sexual, economic and other kinds of discrimination.
1. Encourage critical thinking skills as a means to addressing social and environmental issues
2. A worldview free of supernatural belief systems will encourage a more rational society
3. By calling into question the existence of supernatural persons/places/things we accept full responsibility for our actions and their consequences
cause.mission: Promoting ethical actions and rational communities based on a naturalistic world view
cause.name: Secular Humanism
